original_text: And when he went out to the entrance, another servant girl saw him, and she said to the bystanders, “This man was with Jesus of Nazareth.”
korean_text: 앞문까지 나아가니 다른 여종이 그를 보고 거기 있는 사람들에게 말하되 이 사람은 나사렛 예수와 함께 있었도다 하매

sentences.original_text: And when he went out to the entrance
and she said to the bystanders
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 곁에 서 있는 사람들에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: “This man was with Jesus of Nazareth.”
